post.description: Change password for authenticated user. Required role: `ROLE_USER`
Register a new account
Request an activation token for verifying an email or activating an account
Redeem an activation token to verify an email or activate an account

Execute a query on sales data and return a single data series. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER

get.description: Search catalogue for provider's published assets. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER

delete.description: Delete asset from catalogue. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER

get.description: Downloads an additional resource file
Gets metadata property value for the specified resource file. Roles required: ROLE_USER

delete.description: Remove all items from the cart

get.description: Get shopping cart for the current user session

post.description: Add item to cart

Create a new order from the content of the authenticated user's cart. If operation is successful, an instance of `CheckoutOrderResponse` is returned with the new order; Otherwise an instance of `BaseResponse` is returned with one or more error messages. Moreover, the cart is reset at the server. Roles required: ROLE_CONSUMER

get.description: Search catalogue published items based on one or more criteria. Supports data paging and sorting.

schema.description: Query string used for full text search operation
Page index. Page index is 0-based and cannot be a negative number.
Page size. Page size must be greater than zero.

get.description: Search catalogue published items based on one or more criteria using Elasticsearch. Supports data paging and sorting.

schema.description: Text used for full text search
The nature or genre of the resource
The type of the spatial data service. This filter selects only assets of type `SERVICE`
The file format, physical medium, or dimensions of the resource

items.description: The file format, physical medium, or dimensions of the resource

schema.description: Information about the reference system in automated metadata

items.description: Information about the reference system in automated metadata

schema.description: The temporal extent of the resource (start date)
The temporal extent of the resource (end date)
A high-level classification scheme to assist in the grouping and topic-based search of available spatial data resources
Name of an entity responsible for making the resource available

items.description: Name of an entity responsible for making the resource available

get.description: Search external catalogue harvested items. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER

post.description: Harvest catalogue for metadata. The user can optionally select the type of the catalogue. If type is not set, the default `EnumCatalogueType.CSW` value is used. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER
Create drafts from items harvested from an external catalogue. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER

get.description: Get a single catalogue item by its unique identifier and version.
get.summary: Get asset by id and version

get.description: Get a single catalogue item by its unique identifier.
Find related assets given an asset identifier.
Get application configuration with optional localized resources
Browse consumer's owned assets. Required roles: ROLE_CONSUMER

Get all user registered cards. If operation is successful, an instance of `CardCollectionResponse` is returned with the user's cards; Otherwise an instance of `BaseResponse` is returned with one or more error messages. Roles required: ROLE_CONSUMER

post.description:
Initializes a card registration. If operation is successful, an instance of `CardRegistrationRequestResponse` is returned with the card registration data; Otherwise an instance of `BaseResponse` is returned with one or more error messages.
Client must post card details to `cardRegistrationUrl` as explained in [MANGOPAY Documentation](https://docs.mangopay.com/endpoints/v2.01/cards#e1042_post-card-info) page. Roles required: ROLE_CONSUMER

put.description: Completes the registration of a new card. If operation is successful, an instance of `CardRegistrationResponse` is returned with the new card information; Otherwise an instance of `BaseResponse` is returned with one or more error messages. Roles required: ROLE_CONSUMER

get.description: Search consumer Order records. Required roles: ROLE_CONSUMER

Get Order details. If the operation is successful, an instance of `OrderResponse` is returned with Order details; Otherwise an instance of `BaseResponse` is returned with one or more error messages. Roles required: ROLE_CONSUMER

put.description: Confirm that an order that is shipped externally from the platform has been delivered. The order status must be PENDING_CONSUMER_RECEIVE_CONFIRMATION. Required roles: ROLE_CONSUMER

get.description: Search consumer PayIn records. Required roles: ROLE_CONSUMER

post.description: Create a new bankwire PayIn for the order with the given key. If the operation is successful, an instance of `ConsumerBankWirePayInResponse` is returned with PayIn details; Otherwise an instance of `BaseResponse` is returned with one or more error messages. Moreover, on successful execution, the server resets the user cart; Hence, the client must either reset the cart locally or invoke [Get Cart](#operation/cart-01) should refreshRoles required: ROLE_CONSUMER

Create a new card direct PayIn for the order with the given key. If the operation is successful, an instance of `ConsumerCardDirectPayInResponse` is returned with PayIn details; Otherwise an instance of `BaseResponse` is returned with one or more error messages. Moreover, on successful execution, the server resets the user cart; Hence, the client must either reset the cart locally or invoke [Get Cart](#operation/cart-01). If 3-D Secure validation is required or the operation fails, the cart is not updated. Roles required: ROLE_CONSUMER

Create a new free PayIn for the order with the given key. If the operation is successful, an instance of `ConsumerFreePayInResponse` is returned with PayIn details; Otherwise an instance of `BaseResponse` is returned with one or more error messages. Moreover, on successful execution, the server resets the user cart; Hence, the client must either reset the cart locally or invoke [Get Cart](#operation/cart-01) should refreshRoles required: ROLE_CONSUMER

get.description: Get PayIn details. If the operation is successful, an instance of either `ConsumerBankWirePayInResponse` or `ConsumerCardDirectPayInResponse` is returned with PayIn details; Otherwise an instance of `BaseResponse` is returned with one or more error messages. Roles required: ROLE_CONSUMER

delete.description: Cancel any pending consumer registration request. Roles required: ROLE_USER

post.description: Create or update consumer draft data in the profile of the authenticated user. When saving draft data, validation errors are ignored. Roles required: ROLE_USER

put.description: Update consumer data in the profile of the authenticated user. Roles required: ROLE_USER

get.description: Browse consumer's registered subscriptions. Required roles: ROLE_CONSUMER
Get a single subscription registered to the user's account. Required roles: ROLE_CONSUMER

parameters.description: Subscription key (equal to the linked order key)
parameters.name: key

get.description: Downloads the contract for the specified order item. Currently only one contract exists since orders may have only a single item. Roles required: ROLE_CONSUMER

parameters.description: True if a signed contract is requested. For unsigned contracts, `print` action must be invoked first.For signed ones, both `print` and `sign` methods must be invoked before downloading the file; Otherwise a `404` status code will be returned.
parameters.name: signed

post.description: Prints a contract for the specified order item. Currently only one contract exists since orders can have only a single item. Roles required: ROLE_CONSUMER

put.description: Signs the contract for the specified order item. Currently only one contract exists since orders may have only a single item. The contract must already exists ,i.e. `print` action must be invoked first. Roles required: ROLE_CONSUMER

get.description: Query provider's contract template drafts. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER

post.description: Creates a new contract template draft. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER

delete.description: Deletes a draft contract template. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER

get.description: Get provider's contract template draft by key. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER

post.description: Updates an existing contract template. A draft template must already exists. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER

put.description: Publish a contract template draft. A draft template must already exists. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER

post.description: Create a new draft from an existing contract template. The selectedtemplate must exist and have a status in [`ACTIVE`, `INACTIVE`]. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER

get.description: Query master contract templates. This method is invoked by the provider client for initializing provider template creation. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER
Get a master contract template details by its unique key. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER
Query provider's contract templates. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER

delete.description: Deactivates a contract template. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER

get.description: Get provider's contract template by key. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER
Search catalogue for provider's draft items based on one or more criteria. Supports data paging and sorting. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER

parameters.description: Draft service type. Applicable only for asset type `SERVICE`
parameters.name: serviceType

post.description: Create draft item. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER
Create a new API draft from an existing published asset or a file in user's file system. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER
Create a new draft item from an existing asset. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER

delete.description: Delete a draft item. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER

get.description: Get a single catalogue draft item by its unique identifier. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER

put.description: Update an existing draft item. Resources that are not included in the request, are automatically deleted. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER

post.description: Uploads an additional resource file and links it to selected draft instance. On success, an updated draft is returned with the new resource registration.Roles required: ROLE_PROVIDER

get.description: Downloads an additional resource file. Roles required: ROLE_PROVIDER

post.description: Update metadata samples of an existing draft item that has been accepted by the Helpdesk application. The draft status must be `PENDING_PROVIDER_REVIEW`. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER

Update the visibility of metadata properties of an existing draft item that has been accepted by the Helpdesk application. The draft status must be `PENDING_PROVIDER_REVIEW`. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER
Uploads a resource file and links it to selected draft instance. On success, an updated draft is returned with the new resource registration.Roles required: ROLE_PROVIDER

get.description: Gets metadata property value for the specified resource file. Roles required: ROLE_PROVIDER

put.description: Accept or reject draft by a provider. The draft status must be PENDING_PROVIDER_REVIEW. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER
Update draft and submit for review and publication. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER

delete.description: Deletes a file or directory. A directory must be empty before deletion. Roles required: ROLE_USER

parameters.description: Relative path in user's remote file system
parameters.name: path

get.description: List (recursively) files and folders for user's directory. Roles required: ROLE_USER
Downloads a file. Roles required: ROLE_USER

parameters.description: File path in user's remote file system
parameters.name: path

post.description: Uploads a file to the user's remote file system. If the path does not exist, it is created. If the file already exists, the overwrite attribute must be set to true, or an error is returned. Roles required: ROLE_USER
Creates a directory in the user's remote file system by creating all nonexistent parent directories first. Roles required: ROLE_USER

get.description: Get a single catalogue draft item by its unique identifier. The draft is returned as if it has been published to the catalogue. All automated metadata is displayed (including hidden ones). Required roles: ROLE_HELPDESK
Downloads an additional resource file. Roles required: ROLE_HELPDESK
Gets metadata property value for the specified resource file. Roles required: ROLE_HELPDESK
Enumerate all KYC documents for the authenticated provider or consumer. Required roles: [ROLE_CONSUMER, ROLE_PROVIDER]

post.description: Creates a draft KYC document with status `CREATED`. Required roles: [ROLE_CONSUMER, ROLE_PROVIDER]

get.description: Get a single KYC document by its unique identifier. Required roles: [ROLE_CONSUMER, ROLE_PROVIDER]

put.description: Submit a draft KYC document for validation. The document status must be `CREATED` . Required roles: [ROLE_CONSUMER, ROLE_PROVIDER]

post.description: Adds a new page to a draft KYC document. Pages can be added only to documents with status `CREATED`. The maximum size per page is `7MB`. The supported formats for the documents are `pdf`, `jpeg`, `jpg` and `png`. The minimum size is `1Kb`. Required roles: [ROLE_CONSUMER, ROLE_PROVIDER]
Sends a message to Helpdesk from the authenticated user
Sends a message to the specified provider from the authenticated user
post.summary: Send a message to a provider

get.description: Get all messages of a thread

post.description: Reply to a message thread that belongs to the authenticated user

get.description: Get notebook configuration information. The response, contains all available Jupyter images, user groups, user registered groups and available profiles. If the operation is successful, an instance of `ConfigurationResponse` is returned with Order details; Otherwise an instance of `BaseResponse` is returned with one or more error messages. Roles required: ROLE_CONSUMER

delete.description: Stop running notebook server. Roles required: ROLE_CONSUMER

get.description: Get server status. Roles required: ROLE_CONSUMER

post.description: Start a notebook server for the selected profile. Any other running server must be stopped first. Roles required: ROLE_CONSUMER

get.description: Get user data for the authenticated user. Roles required: ROLE_USER

post.description: Update the profile of the authenticated user. Roles required: ROLE_USER

get.description: Search provider Order records. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER

Get Order details. If the operation is successful, an instance of `OrderResponse` is returned with Order details; Otherwise an instance of `BaseResponse` is returned with one or more error messages. Roles required: ROLE_PROVIDER

put.description: Accept or reject an order when consumer vetting is required. The order status must be PENDING_PROVIDER_APPROVAL. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER
Confirm that an order that is delivered externally from the platform has been shipped. The order status must be PENDING_PROVIDER_SEND_CONFIRMATION. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER

get.description: Search provider PayIn item records. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER

Get PayInItem details. If the operation is successful, an instance of either `ProviderOrderPayInItemResponse` or `ProviderSubscriptionBillingPayInItemResponse` is returned with PayIn item details; Otherwise an instance of `BaseResponse` is returned with one or more error messages. Roles required: ROLE_PROVIDER

parameters.description: PayIn item index. The index is 1-based.
parameters.name: index

get.description: Search provider PayOut records. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER

Get PayOut details. If the operation is successful, an instance of `PayOutResponse` is returned with PayOut details; Otherwise an instance of `BaseResponse` is returned with one or more error messages. Roles required: ROLE_PROVIDER

delete.description: Cancel any pending provider registration request. Required roles: ROLE_USER

post.description: Save a provider registration request as a draft. When saving draft data, validation errors are ignored. Required roles: ROLE_USER

put.description: Submit a provider registration request to the OP platform. Required roles: ROLE_USER

post.description: Creates a quotation for the specified pricing model and quotation parameters. If the operation is successful, an instance of `QuotationResponse` is returned with the new quotation; Otherwise an instance of `BaseResponse` is returned with one or more error messages

get.description: Get all ratings for a specific asset

post.description: Adds a new rating for a specific asset. Required roles: ROLE_CONSUMER

get.description: Get all ratings for a specific provider

post.description: Adds a new rating for a specific provider. Required roles: ROLE_CONSUMER

get.description: Get a list of recommended assets for the currently authenticated user.

parameters.description: Maximum number of recommended assets to return
parameters.name: limit

get.description: Gets all EPSG codes supported by the platform

parameters.description: Partial name of the EPSG code
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: Partial number of the EPSG code
parameters.name: code

get.description: Gets a feature collection of regions specified by the given NUTS codes

parameters.description: A comma separated lits of NUTS codes
parameters.name: code

get.description: Gets a feature collection of regions with an identifier that starts with the specified prefix

parameters.description: The max level (inclusive) of the NUTS regions in the result.If not set, all regions are returned
parameters.name: maxLevel

get.description: Gets the feature of the region specified by the given NUTS code
Searches the NUTS regions of the specified level based on their name. Both local (`name`) and latin (`nameLatin`) fields are searched

Implements a pseudo-WFS service for each level of the NUTS regions. All WFS parameters except for the `bbox` are ignored. The CRS is always set to`EPSG:4326`. Optionally, the response may not included the feature geometries

parameters.description: True if geometries must be included in the response
parameters.name: includeGeometry

get.description: Search the registered subscriptions of provider. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER
Enumerate all UBO declarations for the authenticated provider. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER

post.description: Creates a draft UBO declaration with status `CREATED`. Only a single UBO declaration with status `CREATED`, `INCOMPLETE` or `VALIDATION_ASKED` can exist. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER

get.description: Get a single UBO declaration by its unique identifier. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER

post.description: Submit the draft UBO declaration for validation. The declaration status must be `CREATED` or `INCOMPLETE`. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER
Adds a new UBO to the draft UBO declaration. Only records with status `CREATED` or `INCOMPLETE` can be updated. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER

delete.description: Removes a UBO from the draft UBO declaration. Only records with status `CREATED` or `INCOMPLETE` can be updated. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER

put.description: Updates an existing UBO of the draft UBO declaration. Only records with status `CREATED` or `INCOMPLETE`can be updated. Required roles: ROLE_PROVIDER

get.description: Default redirect endpoint for successful forms login operations, used for refreshing the CSRF token
Default redirect endpoint for successful logout operations, used for refreshing the CSRF token
Handles MANGOPAY webhook events

parameters.description: The ID of whatever the event is
parameters.name: RessourceId

get.description: 3D secure validation redirect URL

parameters.description: The payment provider transaction identifier (PayIn identifier)
parameters.name: transactionId

updateEligibility.description: When is the last date the user is eligible for receiving updates

verifyPassword.description: Account password verification. Must match property password.

activatedAt.description: Date of account activation. Activation occurs when the user email is verified

emailVerified.description: True if the email address is verified

idpUserImage.description: User image URL as retrieved by the IDP user info endpoint

idpUserName.description: User name as retrieved by the IDP user info endpoint

roles.description: User roles. Every user has at least role ROLE_USER.

username.description: User name (always equal to user email)

success.description: True if operation was successful; Otherwise False.

addedOn.description: When the subscription was registered to the user account

segment.description: First asset topic category if any exist

ActivationTokenCommandDto.description: A command used to verify an account or profile email

success.description: True if operation was successful; Otherwise False.

assetDraft.description: Catalogue draft id. Always equal to key property

assetPublished.description: Published asset id. The value is generated by the PID service

helpdeskRejectionReason.description: Rejection reason if the draft has been rejected by a HelpDesk user

ingested.description: True if the file should be imported into PostGIS database and published using WMS/WFS endpoints

key.description: Draft unique identifier. Also the key for the catalogue draft record. If the draft is submitted and a workflow instance is initialized, it is used as the business key

modifiedOn.description: Date of lat update in ISO format

providerRejectionReason.description: Rejection reason if the draft has been rejected by the provider

serviceType.description: Asset service type. Applicable only when asset type is `SERVICE`

fileName.description: File name. If not set, the name of uploaded file is used.

description.description: The description of the file. If not set, the file name is used as text

bundleExtensions.description: Supported file extensions included in a bundle

items.description: Supported file extensions included in a bundle

bundleSupported.description: True if multiple files are supported

success.description: True if operation was successful; Otherwise False.

text.description: The text displayed for the URI. If not set, the uri value is used as text

assets.description: One or more asset PIDs for grouping data

publishers.description: One or more publishers for grouping data. This option is available only to platform administrators. For providers, the service automatically sets the value to the provider key

success.description: True if operation was successful; Otherwise False.

BankAccountDto.description: The user has to proceed a Bank wire to this bank account

items.description: The country 2 letter code as defined in ISO 3166

coverageRestrictionContinents.description: Continents that the users are allowed to apply the asset

coverageRestrictionCountries.description: Countries that the users are allowed to apply the asset

items.description: The country 2 letter code as defined in ISO 3166

domainRestrictions.description: The domains in which users can apply the asset. Can be empty if no restrictions exist

key.description: Model unique identifier. This value is always generated at the server. Any value specified during an update request is ignored.

success.description: True if operation was successful; Otherwise False.
True if operation was successful; Otherwise False.

discountRates.description: Discount rates based on the number of service calls. Each element must have a `count` property with a value greater than the previous one (if one exists)

prePaidTiers.description: Prepaid tiers using service calls as units. Each element must have a `count` property with a value greater than the previous one

success.description: True if operation was successful; Otherwise False.

active.description: Whether the card is active or not

alias.description: A partially obfuscated version of the credit card number

cardType.description: The type of card. Currently only a single card type is supported, `CB_VISA_MASTERCARD`

expirationDate.description: The expiry date of the card in `MMYY` format

id.description: Card unique identifier. This identifier is required for creating a card direct PayIn

validity.description: Card validity. A successful transaction (PreAuthorization or PayIn) is required to validate a card id

registrationData.description: Card registration data returned by the tokenization server.

registrationId.description: Registration identifier created when initialized the card registration

CardRegistrationCommandDto.description: Card registration data required by the API Gateway for completing the registration of card

accessKey.description: Value required for property `accessKeyRef` of tokenization server request

cardRegistrationUrl.description: Card tokenization server URL. Client must submit the card details to this URL

preRegistrationData.description: Value required for property `data` of tokenization server request

registrationId.description: Registration identifier required for submitting the tokenization server response

CardRegistrationDto.description: Card registration data required by the tokenization server

success.description: True if operation was successful; Otherwise False.
True if operation was successful; Otherwise False.

totalItems.description: Number of items in the cart

success.description: True if operation was successful; Otherwise False.

ids.description: Unique identifiers of harvested catalogue items to import.

additionalResources.description: Auxiliary files or additional resources to the dataset

conformity.description: Degree of conformity with the implementing rules/standard of the metadata followed

creationDate.description: A point or period of time associated with the creation event in the lifecycle of the resource

dateStart.description: The temporal extent of the resource (start date)

format.description: The file format, physical medium, or dimensions of the resource

ingested.description: True if the resource files should be imported into PostGIS database and published using WMS/WFS endpoints. Ingest operation is only supported for formats of category VECTOR

externalDocs.description: See configuration endpoint for asset file types details

language.description: A language of the resource as an ISO 639-1 two-letter code

lineage.description: General explanation of the data producer's knowledge about the lineage of a dataset
